question: Hello Tektika

Which airfield has the most military activity?
Zoom into the airport and tell me. What satellite imagery do you have over this airport?

Is it operational?

analyze the latest two sar imagery

What about Bandar Abbas International Airport? Identify all military airplanes there.

NPPAlert
Yes. Give more information about the BNPP Alert.
